title: Ijiranaide, Nagatoro-san: Comic Anthology
description:
Anthology from various doujin artists about Nagatoro and Senpai keeping to the theme of Nagatoro teasing Senpai and sometimes it backfiring on her.

[u][b]Russian / Русский:[/b][/u]  [spoiler]Антология с короткими историями от разных авторов на тему оригинальной манги "Не издевайся, Нагаторо-сан".[/spoiler]

[hr][*][b]Volume 1[/b] (Nagatoro-san wo, Ijiritai!!)
Chomoran, Cool Kyoushinja, Hiroe Rei, Hotondo Shindeiru, Konbu Wakame, Najima Keiji, Nanashi, Orimoto Mimana, Shimimaru, Suzumoto Kou, Uchiyama Atsushi(Attsun)
[*][b]Volume 2[/b] (Soko Ijirunsuka, Nagatoro-san!)
Azu, Katou Yuiichi,  Kawamura Taku, Mochinchi,  Nanashi, Okamoto Lynn, Sukeno Yoshiaki, Suzuki Kenya, Tanigawa Nico, tugeneko, Watanabe Shizumu, Yamamoto Souichirou
[*][b]Volume 3[/b] (Ijirushikanai! Nagatoro-san)
Manga: Sagara Riri, Nishide Kengoro, Andou Masaki (single page), Morishige Takuma, Enokidu/Enokids, Kumano Kyu, Sakurai Norio, Bimita
Illustrations: Issiki/Isshiki, Kitada Ryouma, Souji Hougu, Namori, Nekoume, Yamada Yoshinobu
[*][b]Volume 4[/b] (Motto Shiritai! Nagatoro-san!)
Manga and Illustrations: 774 (Nanashi)
[*][b]Volume 5[/b] (Ippai Misemasu! Nagatoro-san)
Illustrations: Sugiura Jiro, Maki Keigo, CHANxCO, Honjou Raita, nonco, 774 (Nanashi)

[b]Notes:[/b]
[*]The Artist/Author fields only accepted 19 names before failing which isn't ideal for anthologies so I've split them between the two
